info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 21 at 4:33PM EDT until May 21 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh PA
info.description:
TORPBZ
The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... West Central Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... Eastern Butler County in west central Pennsylvania...
* Until 500 PM EDT.
* At 433 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing a tornado were located along a line from near Shanor-Northvue to over Meridian, or along a line from 6 miles northwest of Butler to near Butler, moving northeast at 30 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Butler, Homeacre-Lyndora, Shanor-Northvue, Meridian, Meadowood, Oak Hills, Nixon, Chicora, East Butler, Bruin, Eau Claire, Petrolia, Karns City, Fairview, West Sunbury, Cherry Valley, Hooker and Moraine State Park.
info.instruction: Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 5:00 PM EDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 5:00 PM EDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 5:00 PM EDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 5:00 PM EDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
